modules.description: Provides functions for loading and rendering TrueType fonts, calculating text dimensions, and setting font styles such as bold and italic. Works with font files, text strings, and surface objects for rendering. Used to display styled text in SDL2-based applications, such as game HUDs or user interfaces.

Initializes and terminates TTF support, loads fonts from files with optional index, and renders text in various styles (solid, shaded, blended) onto surfaces using specified colors. Operates on font handles and color records to generate textured surfaces from string inputs. Enables precise control over text rendering for game UI elements and dynamic label creation.
